Detailed Description

Macros, structures defining the IPDR protocol.

Define Documentation

#define IPDR_INVALID_DSN (  x   )     0
 

for 31-bit DSN: ((x) == (IPDR_DSN_TYPE)(-1))

#define IPDR_VALID_DSN_WINDOW   (IPDR_MAX_DSN / 100)
 

Not an error for re-sending a DSN this much older than the expected DSN

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ErrorCode
 

Error codes

Function Documentation

enum IPDR_compareDSN_t compareDSN (  IPDR_DSN_TYPE  d1,
IPDR_DSN_TYPE  d2
) 
 

Compare two DSNs, taking into account wrap-around

Parameters:
d1 the first DSN
d2 the second DSN
Returns:
'>', '=', '<', '?' for d1 > d2, d1 == d2, d1 < d2, not comparable
